name: QuickActionRequest

constructors.name: QuickActionRequest
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the QuickAction.QuickActionRequest class.

methods.name: getContextId
methods.description: Returns this QuickAction’s context record ID.

methods.name: setContextId
methods.description: Sets this QuickAction’s context ID. Returned by getContextId.

methods.name: setQuickActionName
methods.description: Sets this QuickAction’s name. Returned by getQuickActionName.

methods.name: setRecord
methods.description: Sets a record for this QuickAction. Returned by getRecord.

description: Use the QuickAction.QuickActionRequest class for providing action information for quick actions to be performed by QuickAction class methods. Action information includes the action name, context record ID, and record.
